homepage.title: Welcome to Gourmet Delight
homepage.description: Experience the finest dining with a blend of exquisite flavors and a cozy ambiance. Join us for an unforgettable culinary journey.

items.name: Bruschetta
items.description: Grilled bread topped with fresh tomatoes, garlic, and basil.

items.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
items.description: Mushrooms filled with a savory cheese and herb mixture.

items.name: Grilled Salmon
items.description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection, served with a lemon butter sauce.

items.name: Ribeye Steak
items.description: Juicy ribeye steak cooked to your liking, served with garlic mashed potatoes.

items.name: Cheesecake
items.description: Creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust, topped with fresh berries.

items.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
items.description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.
